data.client_settings: UI language Chinese, Japanese being tried

data.short_description: lack of i18n of #deleted-channel while it have been i18n-ed on android client as #invalid-channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Read a message include link to a channel that have been deleted - Use Traditional Chinese Interface - On Android, the string deleted-channel would have be translated (as invalid-channel ?) - On desktop it would not
